raw_body: WEERASINGHE – MAHESH LAKSHITHA – Deputy General Manager (CEB),​ beloved husband of Surakshani Jayawardena,​ loving father of Devrangee Weerasinghe (Attorney-at-Law),​ father-in-law of Ramitha Jayawardene (Standard Chartered Bank),​ dear son of Chitra Amarasekara (Retired Teacher – Nalanda) & (Late) Dr Lesly Weerasinghe,​ brother of Sanjaya Weerasinghe (Intissel Lanka). The remains lie at A.F. Raymond’s,​ Borella from 7.00 p.m. to 10.00 p.m. on 11th March 2024. Cremation will take place at General Cemetery,​ Borella on 12th March 2024 at 6.00 p.m. 017892
